<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Owlbear Claw](/Equipment.aspx?ID=230)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You critically succeed at an attack roll with the affixed weapon

 
</row>

</column>

---

This claw set in an iron clasp and chain isn’t always the claw of an owlbear. When you activate the claw, the triggering attack gains the weapon’s critical specialization effect. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
